definition: section/paragraph/funds/CL:筆|笔[bi3],個|个[ge4]/classifier for versions or models (of a product)

sentences.english: The landlord would smile and reduce interest by 2 percent on the peasant's debt.
sentences.chinese: 地主装出笑脸，把农民所欠的债款减去二厘利。

sentences.english: An unpaid, overdue debt or an unfulfilled obligation.
sentences.chinese: 欠帐未付的，逾期债款或未履行的职责。

sentences.english: Always pay more than the minimum payment toward your debt.
sentences.chinese: 经常在偿还你的债款时，多付一点你能承受的最低量。

sentences.english: I began now gradually to pay off the debt I was under for the printing-house.
sentences.chinese: 现在我开始逐步地还清我为了创办印刷所而借的债款。

sentences.english: He duns me for payment of debt.
Bell threatened to proceed against him for the recovery of the debt.
sentences.chinese: 贝尔扬言为索债款要对他提起诉讼。

definition: to owe a debt/the sum owed
to demand payment of money owing
to pay back in full/to redeem a debt
to repay/to pay off a debt
lit. build a high desk of debt (idiom); heavily in debt
